resources.string: Please swipe to determine the quantity :

Note: you need to create a folder called \"ntlauncher\" in the root directory of the e-book, (sdcard), and place the icon file (in PNG format) in this folder. Then enter the file name in the input box below (please add a suffix name)
Please enter the nickname you want to change
Manual input: display the input directly
Is applying to you to activate the device.
Only need to activate once, only do user equipment model statistics, need to be connected to the Internet. If you don\'t need it, just click cancel. This dialog box is displayed only once.
Please swipe to set the text size
Hidden applications can be restored in Desktop Settings-Application Management
Please enter the city where you live:
For example: Zaozhuang City or: Yicheng District
Sets whether the Weather module is displayed on the desktop
